maqras.text: Alif-Lam-Ra. Aga ni ma Aya ga m’Chitabu (cha Qur’an) soni ni Chisoomo chakupikanika
Kakajinji katakawe achimakafili (ndema jatakawe ku Moto) ali nkulajila kuti bola angawe Asilamu (pawaliji ku duniya)
Mwalekani agambeje kulya ni kusengwa, ni kwaluyaluya liganichisya (lyakupata yambone kwa Allah), basi taachiika kumanyilila (mbesi ja ukafili wao)
Ni nganituujonanjeje musi uliose ikaweje waliji wana chilamusi chakwe chakumanyika (cha ndema jakuujonanjila)
Nkutula uliose nganiuwa ujilongolele ndema jakwe (jakuwila) kapena kujichelewasya (jili jikwanile)
(Achimakafili) ni watite (pakun’gamba Muhammadi ﷺ): “E mmwe awala wachintuluchile Chikumbusyo (Qur’an)! Chisimu mmwejo wamasoka.”
“Uli ngaikanago kukwetu Malaika naga n’di mwa akuwecheta yakuona?”
(Allah akwasalila kuti): Uwwe wangatulusya Malaika ikaweje mwakuonaonape (kwisa kupeleka ipotesi), soni pajele ndemajo ngaakasawaga (achimakafilio) wakupedwa lipesa
Chisimu Uwwe ni Awala watutulwisye Chikumbusyo (Qur’an) soni Uwwe chisimu chene tuchigose
Soni chisimu chene twaatumisye (Achimitume) paujo penu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) m’mikutula (jawandu) wandanda
Ni nganijwaichililaga ntenga jwalijose ikaweje waliji nkuntenda chipongwe
Iyyoyopeyo tukuupitisyaga (nteto wachipongwewo) m’mitima mwa akulewa
Ngakasajikulupililaga jalakwe (Qur’an) kutendaga pamasile payapite ilandanyo ya (wandu) wandanda (yawatite kapedwe ipotesi)
Soni tungaaugulile (achimakafilio) nnango wakwinani, ni kuwa wanganyao ali nkukwela kwalakweko chitetete (mwaakusachila, kuti chiwe chisimosimo cha Muhammadi ﷺ)
Basi angatite: “Chisimu meso getu gantesile ndandagasi. (Ngwamba), nambo kuti uwwe ni wandu wakulogwa (tukuiona ikaliyo).”
Soni chisimu chene tuwisile kwinani ndondwa syekulungwakulungwa ni mwakwenda mwakwe, ni tukusalalisye kwa waakuona
Ni tukugosile ku shetani jwalijose jwakuwinjidwa
Ikaweje jwaakupikanilaga mwawiyi, basi papopo chisinga (cha moto) chakuonechela ni kunkuya
Sano litaka twalijasesye ni kuwika mwalakwemo yakunyichisya (gagali matumbi gausito), ni tumesisye mwalakwemo chindu chilichose chepimepime
Ni tum’bichile mwalakwemo yakulamila wanganyammwe ni ichindu yanganim’ba jenumanja kuti mpaka nkombole kuipatila lisiki (mpela inyama ni ilango ni ine yosope yaumi)
Ni pangali chindu chilichose ikaweje imatiilo yakwe ili Kukwetu, ni ngatukasachitulusyaga ikaweje kwa chipiimo chakumanyika

Soni tukasasitumisyaga mbungo syakuwelekasya (mawunde mesi gawula), basi ni tukasagwisyaga kuumila kwinani mesi (gawula), ni tukasampaga kumwa wanganyammwe galakwe, sano jenumanja ngawa ni wankugasungaga galakwe (mesigo)
Soni chisimu Uwwe ni Awala watukupeleka umi ni chiwa, soni Uwwe ni Wawinjila
Soni pamasile patwamanyi kusyene wawalongolele mwa jenumanja (wawawile kala), soni pamasile patwamanyi kusyene waasigalile (waali chijumi kwisa soni wanganapagwe)
Soni chisimu Ambuje wenu Walakwe ni watachasonganganya wanganyao, chisimu Walakweo ni Walunda lwakusokoka, Wakumanyilila nnope
Soni chisimu chene mundu twan’gumbile ni lilongo lyejumu lyakulilaga (nkuligombamo) lyakuumila m’matope gakupiililila geunde
Sano lijini twaligumbile kala kuumila ku malamba ga moto gangali lyosi
Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kawawechete Ambuje wenu kwa Achimalaika kuti: “Chisimu Une tingumbe mundu ni lilongo lyejumu lyakulilaga (nkuligombamo) lyakuumila m’matope gakupiililila geunde.”
“Sano patimale kunkolosya ni kumpepelela nsimu wakuuma Kukwangu, basi munsenjelemukuchile pakunsujudila.”
Basi ni wasujudu Achimalaika wosope wene nakamo
Pangawaga Ibulisu; jwakanile kuti awe pamo ni akusujudu
(Allah) jwatite: “E mmwe Ibulisu! Chipali chichi kukwenu chintendekasisye kuti nkawa pamo ni akusujudu?”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Une nganimba jwanti nikunsujudila mundu jwamun’gumbile ni lilongo lyejumu lyakulilaga (nkuligombamo) lyakuumila m’matope gakupiililila geunde.”
(Allah) jwatite: “Basi kopokani mwalakwemo, mwanti chisimu mmwe (sano) n’di wakuwinjidwa.”
“Soni chisimu pachanya penu pana malweso mpaka Lisiku Lyamalipilo.”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ambuje wangu! Mumbanitu lipesa (lyakuti ngawa) mpaka lisiku lyatachiukulidwa (m’malembe achiiumbe wosope).”
(Allah) jwatite: “Basi chisimu mmwe n’di mwa akupedwa lipesa.”
“Kwikanila lisiku lya ndema jakumanyika (jagombedwa lipenga lyandanda, pele ni patinchiwila).”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ambuje wangu! Ligongo lyanti munechelele kusokonechela, basi chinasalalichisye kwene wanganyao pa chilambo (litala lyesokonechele), ni chinasokonesye kwene wanaose.”
“Pangawaga achikapolo Wenu wakuswejesyedwa mwa wanganyao.”
(Allah) jwatite: “Ali nilitala lya Kukwangu lyalili lyagoloka.”
“Chisimu achikapolo Wangu nganinkola mmwejo pa wanganyao machili, ikaweje awala watakankuyeje (mwakusaka kwao) mwa akusokonechela.”
Soni chisimu Jahannama ni malo gao gaakupedwa chilanga wanaose
Jikwete milango nsano najiwili, nnango uliose ukwete liunjili mwa wanganyao lyegawidwegawidwe
Chisimu waoga (wakun’jogopa Allah) tachiwa m’Matimbe ga ku Mbepo ni sulo (syasichijilimaga chapasi pakwe)
(Tachisalilidwa kuti) gajinjilani mwantendele n’di wagosedwa
Ni tuchityosya iwundo (ya uchimwa ni litima) yayaliji m’mitima mwao, tachiwa (wakunonyelana) mwaulongo ali (atemi) pa itengu yauchimbichimbi mwakulolegana
Ngagaja kwakwaya mwalakwemo masausyo galigose, soni wanganyao ngaaja koposyedwamo
Mwatagulilani achikapolo Wangu yanti chisimu Une ni jwandi Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
